fields.report:
Legend: MER, Meropenem; ETP, Ertapenem; IPM, Imipenem; CRO, Ceftriaxone; CAZ, Ceftazidime; CFX, Cefoxitin; CPM, Cefepime; CTX, Cefotaxime; NAL, Nalidixic Acid; CIP, Ciprofloxacin; AMC, Amoxicillin/clavulanic acid; ATM, Aztreonam; AMI, Amikacin; GEN, Gentamicin; SXT, Sulfamethoxazole/trimethoprim; ENO, Enrofloxacin; CHL, Chloramphenicol; FOS, Fosfomycin; CEP, Cephalothin ; CTF, Ceftiofur; AMP, Ampicillin; TET, tetracycline; COL*,Colistin

Antibiotics were tested by disk diffusion method, except colistin (*), which was analyzed by the broth microdilution method to determine the minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC). The interpretations were carried out according to CLSI and BrCAST.
